title: Export Data for a Client
description: A client has requested a raw data export of their campaign performance from the last month.

tasks.description: Select the correct date range (last month) in the ad platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the date range correctly.

tasks.description: Select all relevant performance columns to include in the export.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses the columns for spend, clicks, impressions, etc.

tasks.description: Export the data as a CSV file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully downloads the requested raw data.
